scripts.build:auth: rm -rf build/authentication && parcel build src/authentication.html --dist-dir build/authentication
scripts.build:finance: rm -rf build/finance && parcel build src/finance.html --dist-dir build/finance
scripts.build:inventory: rm -rf build/inventory && parcel build src/inventory.html --dist-dir build/inventory
scripts.build:orders: rm -rf build/orders && parcel build src/orders.html --dist-dir build/orders
scripts.build:reports: rm -rf build/reports && parcel build src/reports.html --dist-dir build/reports
scripts.build:staff: rm -rf build/staff && parcel build src/staff.html --dist-dir build/staff
scripts.build:uikit: rm -rf build/uikit && parcel build src/uikit.html --dist-dir build/uikit
scripts.build:all: npm run build:auth && npm run build:finance && npm run build:inventory && npm run build:orders && npm run build:reports && npm run build:staff && npm run build:uikit
